title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.44 - Betterment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.44 - Betterment

State Regulations

An expenditure having the effect of extending the useful
life of an existing fixed asset, increasing its normal rate of output, lowering
its operating cost, increasing rather than merely maintaining efficiency or
otherwise adding to the worth of benefits it can yield. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.44

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
